long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tendray is a simple and automatic way for you to support your favorite charitable organization every time you shop online without any extra expense. When you shop online via www.tendray.com or through Shopper’s Kindness, you’ll find the exact same low prices, vast selection and convenient shopping experience as of Flipkart, Amazon & Snapdeal, with the added bonus that Tendray will donate a portion of the purchase price to your favorite charitable organization. You can choose from the exclusive list of organizations to support.

For more,

http://www.tendray.com/blog/faq/faq/
